H0.text: Which English football club play their home games at Craven Cottage. Chelsea FC

H1.text: Which English football club play their home games at Craven Cottage. Queens Park Rangers

H2.text: Which English football club play their home games at Craven Cottage. Brentford FC

H3.text: Which English football club play their home games at Craven Cottage. Fulham FC

A4.text: They have played home games at Craven Cottage since 1896.

A5.text: Chelsea's ground, Stamford Bridge, is within Fulham and only 1.8 miles from Craven Cottage.
